0.name: {~00AAFF}Third Upgrade Mod Changelog s3.2.0}
0.text:
[!] New buildings to construct.

[!] Graphical overhaul of some creatures.

[!]Portal of Summoning is functional again.

[!] Countless fixes and much more! {~00AAFF}Full changelog in the mod's Discord channel.}

1.name: {~FFE400}Wog options disabled for TUM}
1.text:
The following Wog Options are disabled by default in TUM due to incompatibilities:

[-]Rebalanced Creatures
[-]Enhanced Monsters
[-]Upg level 7 become level 8
[-]Extended Upgrades
[-]Universal Upgrades
[-]Rampart Farie Dragon
[-]Buckler of Beelzebub
[-]Enhanced Creature
[-]Adittional Uprades
[-]Combo artifacts from Enhanced Artifacts II
[-]Monster Specialities from Hero Specialization Boosts.
